GENERAL.NAME: Name
GENERAL.CONFIRM_DELETE: Are you sure you want to delete the {{type}} "{{name}}"?

RECOVER.DESCRIPTION: Enter your email address or username below and we'll send you an email containing a password reset link.
RECOVER.SENT: An email has been sent to the email you provided or the email linked to the username you provided. Emails may take a few minutes to come through.
RECOVER.RESET_DESCRIPTION: Type your new password below. When you press reset you will be redirected to login. Use your new password from then on.

HOME.NO_STATS: Not enough data to produce statistics graphs

HOURS.DESCRIPTION: These are the opening hours that your premises adheres to. This can be helpful for users to see when you are open.

TABLES.DESCRIPTION: These are the tables in your premises that customers can scan into and order drinks to. Users will be able to see the name that you give to each table.

MENUS.DESCRIPTION: Menus are used to display to your offerings to users. You can have multiple menus and have them active at different times.
MENUS.MOVE_SECTION_UP: Move this section up in the display list
MENUS.MOVE_SECTION_DOWN: Move this section down in the display list

PAYMENTS.DESCRIPTION: Payments are provided by Stripe Payments. You are responsible for creating and maintaining an account with Stripe. Any fees that are charged by Stripe are paid by you. An additional x% is also taken from each payment.

ERRORS.DIALOG_CONTENT:
We're really sorry!
Something seems to have gone wrong.
Please refresh and give it another go.
ERRORS.LOAD_ERROR: Sorry, Tab is taking too long to load

LEGAL.COOKIES_BODY:
Tab utilises cookies and local storage to provide some of the functionality of our products. Products that use these technologies include our web application and mobile apps. 

 In short, we use these technologies to provide things the ability to log in and saving some of your preferences and actions.
